Megan can introduce you to 5 people at American Express

I am the owner and managing attorney at Your Contract Shop. I was born and raised around entrepreneurs and business people. From a very young age, I was attending networking events, strategic planning meetings, and marketing seminars. My passion for helping businesses grow inspired me to go to law school, where I graduated with honors and created and supported a number of school organizations. I currently own my own business consulting firm in addition to being a practicing business law attorney.Prior to law school, I worked as the Business Manager for a software development company, the Deputy Director for a statewide initiative, and a lobbyist for the Arizona Department of Veterans Services. Additionally, I was the Chief Operations Officer of a web-based real estate training company, where I managed hundreds of clients and a full staff of employees.  When I'm not working, I love kayaking, camping, and granting wishes through the Make-A-Wish Foundation.
45 W. Jefferson St., Suite 806, Phoenix, AZ 85003

Connecting the players in the world of beautiful functional design. Highlighting the unique perspective that DUO Design brings to the architecture and product design scene in Arizona. Seeking out partnerships with public and private contributors to the beautification of our community.
Consulting small business owners on the fastest and best ways to make their cash registers ring more often!
The 990 Company and Real Estate Mavericks

I assisted the Chief Executive Officer/Founder in inspiring real estate agents to change the way America sells homes. During my time with REM, I formed and negotiated contracts/agreements; managed employees and contractors; created marketing/advertising campaigns; advised the owners on strategies and outcomes; built and developed the infrastructure; and everything else that management does with a startup!

"Ridiculously efficient" is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Megan. She is one of those rare managers who also naturally serves as an inspiring mentor for the whole staff. With a background in law and many years of experience in customer service and sales, Megan exhibits strong interpersonal skills and a unique capacity for empathy. These qualities most notably translate in her ability to motivate a team to care about its project and be invested in the project’s success. Megan is the go-to person for conflict resolution and problem-solving. Though she’s never one to draw attention to herself, Megan’s positive attitude and the respect others feel toward her are palpable. She has truly inspired me to work harder and most importantly be kinder. I have never worked for anyone I respect as much as Megan. I would highly recommend Megan in any leadership position.

March 26, 2013, Greg was Megan’s teacher

A woman like Megan is impossible to describe with just words.  There is an "heavenly" energy that resonates within her and shines out to other people in her life like high beam headlights.  She is a true original, a stand out in a sea of others who just see the world as it is and conform to it.  Not Megan…she sees the world as it can be and she is going to make it so.  If you have the privilege of calling her your friend, as I so thankfully do, you should feel blessed to have such an angel in your life.  Megan…some days I felt as if you were the teacher and I was the student.  You are going to change the world, and I can't wait to see it.  Your friend and advocate for life, Greg.

Brion has helped two generations of my family protect their assets and grow their businesses and wealth. His authenticity, enthusiasm, and intelligence are unmatched in an industry that is usually inundated with misunderstanding. He is one of the few wealth advisors, who has actually explained the world of investing in a way that my entire family understood it. Because of his efforts in educating us, we are able to make smart decisions about our money and our businesses. I feel unfairly constrained to simple words when describing how much Brion has done for us, so I will simply say thank you!

summary: My absolute favorite thing in the entire world is helping people. After doing quite a bit of soul searching, I realized that my best and highest use is helping people realize their dreams of entrepreneurship. I am a connector, a cheerleader, a paradigm shifter, and an entrepreneur. I look forward to getting to know you and figuring out how I can help you realize your dream!
